newsitem.title: BAHRAIN: PRESS DIGEST - Saudi newspapers - May 4.
newsitem.headline: PRESS DIGEST - Saudi newspapers - May 4.

text.p: These are some of the leading stories in the Saudi Arabian press on Sunday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- At least 115 Pakistanis and 94 Indians were killed in the huge fire in Mena during the annual haj pilgrimage, diplomats say.
- Saudi Arabia to extend four million riyals to Palestinians.
- Saudi Industrial Development Fund agrees to lend seven industrial projects 173 million riyals.
- Commerce ministry to set up a tourism company with capital of 100 million riyals.
